mapper.sql: board_no, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate, deletedate, viewcnt, delete_yn
mapper.select: select * from tbl_board where board_no > 0 and delete_yn = 'N' order by regdate desc, board_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board(title, content, writer) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select COUNT(*) from tbl_board where delete_yn = 'N'
mapper.update: update tbl_board set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, writer=#{writer}, updatedate=now() where board_no=#{board_no}
